title: I've had my main account hacked please help
body: I've had my main account hacked and I've put and ticket up with riot support it's been more than 12 hours and still haven't receive no response I'm scared to lose my account I've had it for years now.

replies.body: We currently have a high volume of tickets so it may be a bit.  In the meantime, don't reply to your ticket or create duplicates as that can bump you back to the bottom or cause delays.  I wasn't able to find a ticket with the account you're posting from.  If you have a ticket number I'd be happy to check on it for you!

yes please my ticket number is #24109626 if there anything you need from me like a  question I would only know please feel free to ask me this has kinda spook me I can provide any information needed I've had this account for years now with no problem.
Thanks!  It looks like that ticket was closed as a duplicate and you have another ticket open.  A specialist currently has that ticket and will be reaching out to you as soon as possible.  Good luck!
ok yea sorry I panic and made two yesterday because I remember new information that was asked. But thank you
